alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Worcester, eastern Hampshire and east central Hampden Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookfield, or 15 miles southwest of Worcester, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Southbridge, Charlton, Palmer, Spencer, Ware, Sturbridge, Monson, Rutland, Barre, Warren, Paxton, North Brookfield, West Brookfield, Brimfield, Brookfield, Hardwick, Holland, East Brookfield, Oakham and Wales. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
